plot: Known in English at Festivals as &"Weightwatch,&" this title captures the essence of the film. Susie is obsessed about losing weight, thus being &"bonita&" and not &"gorda&" - the two keywords in the original Spanish title. She calls on a fairy godmother to grants her three wishes. Susie resorts to these to become the most beautiful woman in the world.
title: La suerte de la fea... a la bonita no le importa
